# creationDate

**Instance Property**

The time at which this stroke path starts.

## Declaration

```swift
var creationDate: Date { get }
```

## Discussion

The time offset of the contained stroke points is relative to this date.

## Getting the stroke path properties

- **count**: The number of control points in this stroke path.

items.description: The number of control points in this stroke path.
